title: Generate Acceptance Test Foam Cards
description: When clicking "Create Acceptance Test" button, 1-3 acceptance test cards are generated in the modal as a list of foam cards with Given-When-Then text inputs
iWant: to click "Create Acceptance Test" and see 1-3 pre-generated acceptance test foam cards
soThat: I can quickly create structured acceptance tests with separate Given-When-Then input fields

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am viewing a user story details panel
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click the "Create Acceptance Test" button
acceptanceCriteria.then: a modal opens displaying 1-3 acceptance test foam cards as a list

acceptanceCriteria.given: the modal displays acceptance test foam cards
acceptanceCriteria.then: each card contains separate text input fields for Given, When, and Then

acceptanceCriteria.given: I have acceptance test foam cards displayed
acceptanceCriteria.when: I interact with the Given-When-Then inputs
acceptanceCriteria.then: I can edit each field independently within each foam card
